name: Woods Clearing
text: A small, circular clearing deep in the forest. The grass here is yellowed and dry, despite the recent rain. In the center stands a weathered stone pillar, half-covered in moss. To the north, a narrow path winds back towards the trailhead.

pillar.description: It's an ancient stone pillar, about four feet tall. It feels unnervingly warm to the touch.

passive_checks.success_text: You notice faint, rhythmic etchings near the base, resembling claw marks.
The placement of the pillar suggests it wasn't built here; it was moved, possibly centuries ago.

interactions.use: You place your hand on the pillar. A faint hum vibrates through your palm, and for a moment, the yellowed grass seems to pulse with a dull grey light.

grass.description: Brittle and colorless. It crunches like glass under your boots.

passive_checks.success_text: The way the grass bends... it's like something heavy was dragged through here recently. Or many things.

memory_trigger.text: You remember sitting in a place like this once. But the sun was bright, and someone was laughing. The memory is cut short by a flash of red.

choices.text: [Empathy (Hard)] Close your eyes and feel the atmosphere.
